name: Herodom
description:
Immerse yourself in epic battles inspired on historical and cultural events, including the Battle of the 300, the Dead Wedding and the Mad Pyramids.

Explore an immersive world stacked with little secrets. Battle in 20 different levels, collect all of the 50+ unique heroes and master the 150+ different units and siege weapons to battle with.

Unleash your imagination, and build your own characters using the 300+ different assets to collect during the main storyline.

For the King and the Queen!

Herodom combines unit, resource and city management with interactive combat elements and collecting unique characters.

Artwise, Herodom is very much influenced by the art created for the Liberated Pixel Cup.
